talk010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But...<sp:5:1:0>when I tried to go back to it,
there were a bunch of monsters
coming out of the woodwork.
Tree monsters and bone monsters. So
I'm keeping guard here to warn other
Koroks, because it's real dangerous.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But I'm not about to stop any Hylians who
are feeling brave. <sp:5:0:0>Just be careful.

Oh, and the flowers are there to help
keep you from getting lost. So don't go
picking them!
talk002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Oh, you're a Hylian. Well, since you're not
a Korok, I guess I don't need to stop you.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>There's this thing beyond here that I can't
stop thinking about... I keep wanting to go
check it out again.
talk003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You know<sp:5:0:0> the thing that showed up in
Korok Forest?<sp:5:0:0> I saw something similar
to that, but it looked kinda different...
talk009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There's lots of monsters past here, so be
careful if you continue on.

Oh, and the flowers are there to help
keep you from getting lost. So don't go
picking them!
